A café (US: /ˈkæfeɪ/ or UK: /ˈkæf/), also spelled cafe, is an establishment that primarily serves coffee, related coffee beverages (café latte, cappuccino, espresso), tea, and other hot beverages. Some coffeehouses also serve cold beverages such as iced coffee and iced tea.
